content: the round following chart on page 6 knit 2 repeats of the chart over the next 30 34 stitches pick up an additional 15 stitches along the other edge of the heel flap on the opposite site k until the end of the round you should have a total of 80 88 stitches on your needles row 1 k30 34 stitches following the chart k1 ssk k until last 3 st k2tog k1 row 2 k30 34 stitches following the chart k until end of round repeat row 1 and 2 until you have a total of 60 68 stitches on your needles 4 foot k30 34 stitches following the chart k until end of round continue working the chart on the top of the foot and stockinette on the bottom of the foot continue as such until you reach the desired length for your size standard measurements from the heel to the beginning of the toe sizes 36/37 38/39 40/41 42/43 length in cm 18 5 20 21 22 length in inch 7 3 7 9 8 3 8 7 toe row 1 *k1 k2tog k24 28 ssk k1* repeat a second time row 2 k all stitches row 3 *k1 k2tog k 22 26 ssk k1* repeat a second
